titleStmt.title: A knights coniuring Done in earnest: discouered in iest. By Thomas Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632. Newes from hell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for VVilliam Barley, and are to be solde at his shop in Gratious streete,

notesStmt.note: An enlargement of Dekker's "Newes from hell".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
